entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
